name: io.github.cyanheads/survey-mcp-server
description: MCP server for conducting dynamic, conversational surveys with structured data collection.

environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').
environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Path to the directory containing survey definition files.
environmentVariables.name: SURVEY_DEFINITIONS_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Path to the directory where survey responses are stored.
environmentVariables.name: SURVEY_RESPONSES_PATH

environmentVariables.description: The hostname for the HTTP server.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_HOST

environmentVariables.description: The port to run the HTTP server on.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_PORT

environmentVariables.description: The endpoint path for the MCP server.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_ENDPOINT_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').
environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Path to the directory containing survey definition files.
environmentVariables.name: SURVEY_DEFINITIONS_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Path to the directory where survey responses are stored.
environmentVariables.name: SURVEY_RESPONSES_PATH
